title.rendered: Integrated T&D Long Term Voltage Stability

content.rendered:
1. This paper investigates the impact of Distribution system components on Integrated TD Voltage stability assessment. Paper also presents a novel method to distinguish between transmission induced voltage stability and distribution induced voltage stability. (https://arxiv.org/abs/1809.10540)
  2. This paper introduces a three phase Voltage stability index for integrated T&D Voltage stability assessment. Authors extend the single phase index towards three phase index with ability to determine the exact phase under stress. Moreover, a three phase Transmission, Distribution distinguishing index is also introduced. (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/8718824)
